rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0001
rows.name: Hana-chan...

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0002
rows.name: Yes?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0003
rows.name: It's somewhat strange, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0004
rows.name:
Even though you look so different
you're still the same Hana-chan.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0005
rows.name:
It is strange indeed.
Even Tora thinks so 
sometimes meh.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0006
rows.name: Even though you made her?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0007
rows.name: Exactly!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0008
rows.name: Hana grew so much all at once!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0009
rows.name: That's an excellent suggestion!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0010
rows.name: Very good idea.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0011
rows.name: What do you mean by mode name?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0012
rows.name:
Hana's smaller form is
formally called 
"Jet Spark Mode."

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0013
rows.name: Oh really? I didn't know that.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0014
rows.name:
And this form is
"Justice Knight Mode."

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0015
rows.name: Wow, that's a cool name!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0016
rows.name:
When I'm in this form,
I'd like to be called 
"Justice Knight Hana-chan" please.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0017
rows.name:
Justice Knight Hana-chan[ML:Dash ]
Isn't that too difficult to say?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0018
rows.name: Justice Knight Hana[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0019
rows.name:
It's definitely cumbersome.
Thinking about it, distinguishing
between forms is too much trouble.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0020
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0021
rows.name:
Tora has been secretly planning 
to add yet another mode.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0022
rows.name:
When that happens,
we'll need to distinguish between
three different forms.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0023
rows.name: But that far too much bother!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0024
rows.name: "Hana"!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0025
rows.name: That nice and simple, best way to call.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0026
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0027
rows.name: I agree as well.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0028
rows.name:
What's this new mode 
 you're talking about?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0101
rows.name:
I also think that calling her
Hana-chan is the best option.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0102
rows.name:
It's short, clear,
and a good name after all.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0103
rows.name:
And besides, no matter 
how she looks, she's still 
the same Hana-chan.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0104
rows.name:
...That's what you two
were saying earlier.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0105
rows.name:
Hana doesn't mind at all
being called just Hana.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0106
rows.name: Good good.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0107
rows.name: We came full circle.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0108
rows.name:
By the way, Masterpon,
will there really be 
a new mode added?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0201
rows.name: I'm glad you asked!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0202
rows.name:
The name is 
"Judgment Day Mode."

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0203
rows.name: That is another very impressive name!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0204
rows.name: It sounds powerful[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0205
rows.name:
It's a name that came to me while I was 
debating whether to step into hot springs
with my left foot or right foot.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0206
rows.name:
The origin story isn't 
particularly impressive...

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0207
rows.name:
So how will Hana-chan
transform?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0208
rows.name: Not determined yet.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0209
rows.name: Not determined?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0210
rows.name:
I only decided on the name,
I'll think about 
the details later.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0211
rows.name:
Sounds like it not happen
any time soon.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0212
rows.name: That's not the case at all!

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0213
rows.name:
If you store up ideas daily,
the final design will suddenly
come rushing to you all at once.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0214
rows.name: That's the way of an inventor.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0215
rows.name: Is that really the case?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0216
rows.name:
When inspiration hits, I'll take you back
to my house and give you a power-up, 
so believe in me and wait.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0217
rows.name:
I understand
I'll wait without getting 
my hopes up too much.

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0218
rows.name: You have absolutely no faith in me?

rows.label: kizunatalk030_msg0219
rows.name:
Hehehe... Even when her form changes,
Hana-chan really is still 
Hana-chan, isn't she?
